item.title: Short note about Clint Eastwood
item.description: Clint Eastwood has been an absolute inspiration and hero to me (and for the longest time). When I try explaining my reasoning to suprised people, i'm never able to frame it properly. Do I like his acting in spaghetti westerns ? Yes I do, but that's not exactly it. Do I like his elegant narrative directorials ? I love them, but that's not it too. Both of these reasons are simplistic and don't hit the nail exactly about why I revere Mr Clint Eastwood.
